sense.gloss: amazing (e.g. of strength), great (e.g. of skills), wonderful, terrific
to a great extent, vast (in numbers)

sdata.j: ↑今↑↓いま↓じゃ、ボクのお↑料理↑↓りょうり↓レベルは、１００↑点↑↓てん↓↑中↑↓ちゅう↓４５↑点↑↓てん↓くらい。|スゴイ|だろ、↑赤↑↓あか↓↑点↑↓てん↓じゃないのさ！
sdata.e: Right now my score in Cooking is about 45 out of 100. Great isn't it? That's not a fail!

sdata.j: へー、キーボード↑見↑↓み↓ないで↑文字↑↓もじ↓↑打↑↓う↓てるんだ。|スゴイ|わねー。
sdata.e: Oh? You can type without looking at the keyboard. That's cool!
